thread.title: Occult and Psychical Sciences: Daily Kos longtime member Lamont Cranston has passed 🔥
thread.title_full: Occult and Psychical Sciences: Daily Kos longtime member Lamont Cranston has passed 🔥

title: Occult and Psychical Sciences: Daily Kos longtime member Lamont Cranston has passed 🔥
text: 🔥 From Sockpuppet : "It is with a saddened and broken heart that I report that our dear friend and longtime Kossack “LamontCranston” passed away on Thursday mid-morning. He was resting after a long, trying flight home from a vacation to Germany. Mrs LC was letting him nap while she did their sheep-farm chores. She found him deceased, apparently from a blood clot to the brain. She said he looked peaceful, not as if he suffered at all." (Thanks Sockpuppet) He will be sorely missed. He was a very sweet, caring person, funny, with a joie de vivre for enjoying his life with his lovely wife and their beautiful sheep herding dogs. We will miss his wit, and his passion for our Democracy. R.I.P., LC. We miss you already. 🙏🏽😢😥🥀🕊️ . 🔥 LamontCranston's Profile Retired Network Security Systems Engineer Occupation: Shepherd/Farmer - We grow wool! Groups: Pro Choice, DKos Sangha, DKos Asheville, Global Expats, Black Kos community, Appalachian Journal, MOT - Morning Open Thread, North Carolina Blue, People Power Grassroots, People Power National, DK Fans of 90 for 90, Moral Movement Forward Together, Humour and Politics, First People Power, The Political Revolution, 27 Dollars Most Recommended Diary: Thomas Piketty: “Germany has never repaid.”, 437 comments, 576 recommends Hobbies: Life. 🔥 He will be sorely missed.
